message: And no, I'm not forgetting UX Week in SF (August 2011) or SXSW'12 :)
A few possibilities I've come across: Picnic in Amsterdam, September 2011 (http://www.picnicnetwork.org/) or Le Web in Paris, December 2011 (http://www.leweb.net/).
Hi everyone. I'm thinking about attending 1-2 conferences a year but I'm not 100% sure where to go. It's easier to stay within Europe but other continents are okay as well.
How many times are you going to post the same messages?

There is the theory of the Moebius... a twist in the fabric of space where time becomes a loop. Loop where time becomes a. A loop where time becomes. Becomes a loop where time. Time becomes a loop where. ...Where time becomes a loop.
Take a look at 'ux Tuesday's (assuming you're not a spambot!)
